Legal_Issue: Viability of Internal Flight Alternative (IFA) given credible fear of violence from ex-husband
Application_Facts: Applicant feared violence from her ex-husband in Mexico; had custody disputes; Board found IFA in Mexico if she did not seek custody
Decision_Outcome: Board's decision set aside; application allowed; case referred for new determination
Remedy_Requested: Refugee protection based on domestic abuse and risk in country of origin
Court_Ruling: The Board's determination of a viable IFA was unreasonable due to credible threats and expectation to abandon parental rights
Claimant_Status: Refugee claimant fearing persecution due to domestic violence
Defendant_Behavior: Ex-husband issued credible threats; history of domestic abuse and custody conflict
Grounds_for_Claim: Domestic abuse, fear of persecution, lack of state protection in Mexico
Legal_Standard: IFA test: no serious risk of persecution and conditions not unreasonably harsh
Assessment_Factor: Credibility of fear, availability of state protection, reasonableness of IFA conditions
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of Refugee Protection Division decision
Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's fear of violence from ex-husband found credible
Evidence_Used: Threats from ex-husband, history of abuse, custody issues
Application_Basis: Fear of persecution due to domestic violence and gender-based harm
Evidence_Assessed: Credible evidence of threats and risk if returned
Relief_Sought: Refugee protection and safe haven in Canada
Governing_Rule: Internal Flight Alternative must be reasonable and safe without requiring abandonment of fundamental rights
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Board failed to account for credible threats and unreasonable condition of relinquishing custody
Outcome: Application allowed; decision set aside; remitted for new hearing
Harm_Assessment: Serious risk of violence and persecution if returned to Mexico
Cause_Description: Domestic abuse and custody conflict with ex-husband in Mexico creating well-founded fear of persecution
Evidence_Handling: Credible evidence of abuse and threats considered by court
Evidence_Issues: Board ignored credible evidence regarding safety risks
Evidence_Assessment: Evidence supported applicant's credibility and risk
Decision_Rationale: IFA unreasonable because it required放弃 parental rights under threat of violence
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to properly assess safety of IFA under real-world constraints
Legal_Standard_Applied: Reasonableness standard in judicial review of administrative decisions
